request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8080/api/passenger/create" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "age": 30,
    "phone": "9876543210",
    "address": {
      "street": "123 Main St",
      "city": "Delhi",
      "state": "DL",
      "zip": "110001"
    },
    "trainIds": [1, 2]
  }'

    "id": "00005",
    "name": "akask",
    "age": 25,

    "cellno": "+919876543210",
    "dob": "1999-05-10",
    "pincode": "509103",
    "salary": 25000,
